channel.title: File not found
channel.description:
Hi I keep getting these 2 errors, I just can't get rid of them!
[CODE]./data/cfg/items.cfg: file not found. ./data/cfg/shops.cfg: file not found. [18/06/12 23:47]: Launching Teamtorva in 3... 2... 1... Starting...Now! [18/06/12 23:47]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594 [/CODE]
even tho items.cfg is in data/cfg and shops.cfg too! The "data" folder is written correctly, I know linux is case sensitive. It loads other things like: [CODE]loadAutoSpawn("./data/cfg/spawn-config.cfg");[/CODE]
can someone please help me ?

item.title: File not found
item.dc:creator: @tekstyled555 tekstyled555
item.description:
@tekstyled555 wrote:

[quote=“Code kai, post:5, topic:445768”][quote author=tekstyled555 link=topic=548625.msg4021698#msg4021698 date=1340056574]
What ? it doesn’t give an error for spawn-config.cfg, it’s items.cfg and shops.cfg that I’m having trouble with
[/quote]

He means that you should double check the location of your shops.cfg and items.cfg in your data\cfg file.[/quote][quote=“Code kai, post:5, topic:445768”][quote author=tekstyled555 link=topic=548625.msg4021698#msg4021698 date=1340056574]
What ? it doesn’t give an error for spawn-config.cfg, it’s items.cfg and shops.cfg that I’m having trouble with
[/quote]

He means that you should double check the location of your shops.cfg and items.cfg in your data\cfg file.[/quote]

What are you talking about ? It’s right there.

da15390d744d9467ffc5986353de9dec.png848×375

Read full topic

item.title: File not found
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

tekstyled555:

What ? it doesn’t give an error for spawn-config.cfg, it’s items.cfg and shops.cfg that I’m having trouble with

He means that you should double check the location of your shops.cfg and items.cfg in your data\cfg file.

Read full topic

item.title: File not found
item.dc:creator: @tekstyled555 tekstyled555
item.description:
@tekstyled555 wrote:

What ? it doesn’t give an error for spawn-config.cfg, it’s items.cfg and shops.cfg that I’m having trouble with

Some more information:

location of ItemHandler.java:
torva\src\server\world\ItemHandler.java

location of items.cfg:
torva\data\cfg\items.cfg

ItemHandler line:
loadItemList("./data/cfg/items.cfg");

Read full topic

item.title: File not found
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

You do not have the file “spawn-config.cfg” in the folder data>cfg. Same with shops.cfg

Read full topic
